original_text: But their scribes and Pharisees murmured against his disciples, saying, Why do ye eat and drink with publicans and sinners?
korean_text: 바리새인과 그들의 서기관들이 그 제자들을 비방하여 이르되 너희가 어찌하여 세리와 죄인과 함께 먹고 마시느냐

sentences.original_text: But their scribes and Pharisees murmured
saying, Why do ye eat and drink
